

\begin{enumerate}




\item Add missing annotations.
 %(P\land Q)}}

\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{\lnot P\mc{\lor }\lnot Q}{premise}

\ai{P\mc{\land }Q}{P\mc{\land }Q}{\mask{A}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P}{\mc{\lnot }P}{\mask{A}}

\ai{P\mc{\land }Q}{P}{\mask{2,\conjE}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P, P\mc{\land }Q}{\mc{\lnot }P}{\mask{3}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P}{\mc{\lnot }(P\land Q)}{\mask{4,5,\negI}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }Q}{\mc{\lnot }Q}{\mask{A}}

\ai{P\mc{\land }Q}{Q}{\mask{2,\conjE}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }Q, P\mc{\land }Q}{\mc{\lnot }Q}{\mask{7}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }Q}{\mc{\lnot }(P\land Q)}{\mask{8,9,\negI}}

\ai{Γ}{\mc{\lnot }(P\land Q)}{\mask{1,6,10,\disjE}}

\end{argumentN}

\item Add annotations.


\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

 \ai{Γ}{\mc{\lnot }(P\land Q)}{\mask{premise}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{\mask{A}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P}{\mc{\lnot }P}{\mask{A}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P}{\lnot P\mc{\lor }\lnot Q}{\mask{3,\disjI}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q), \mc{\lnot }P}{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor 
\lnot Q)}{\mask{2}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{\mc{\lnot }\lnot P}{\mask{4,5,\negI}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{P}{\mask{6,\negE}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }Q}{\mc{\lnot }Q}{\mask{A}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }Q}{\lnot P\mc{\lor }\lnot Q}{\mask{8,\disjI}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q), \mc{\lnot }Q}{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor 
\lnot Q)}{\mask{2}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{\mc{\lnot }\lnot Q}{\mask{9,10,\negI}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{Q}{\mask{11,\negE}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{P\mc{\land }Q}{\mask{7,12,\conjI}}

\ai{Γ, \mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{\mc{\lnot }(P\land Q)}{\mask{1}}

\ai{Γ}{\mc{\lnot }\lnot (\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{\mask{13,14,\negI}}

\ai{Γ}{\lnot P\mc{\lor }\lnot Q}{\mask{15,\negE}}

\end{argumentN}

\item Add missing datums.

%Derive from \p{\seq{Γ}{\mc{\lnot }(P\land Q)}} to \p{\seq{Γ}{\lnot P\mc{\lor }\lnot Q}}

\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{\mc{\lnot }(P\land Q)}{premise}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}}{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{A}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }P}}{\mc{\lnot }P}{A}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }P}}{\lnot P\mc{\lor }\lnot Q}{3,\disjI}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q), \mc{\lnot }P}}{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot 
P\lor \lnot Q)}{2}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}}{\mc{\lnot }\lnot P}{4,5,\negI}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}}{P}{6,\negE}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }Q}}{\mc{\lnot }Q}{A}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }Q}}{\lnot P\mc{\lor }\lnot Q}{8,\disjI}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q), \mc{\lnot }Q}}{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot 
P\lor \lnot Q)}{2}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}}{\mc{\lnot }\lnot Q}{9,10,\negI}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}}{Q}{11,\negE}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}}{P\mc{\land }Q}{7,12,\conjI}

\ai{\mask{Γ, \mc{\lnot }(\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}}{\mc{\lnot }(P\land Q)}{1}

\ai{\mask{Γ}}{\mc{\lnot }\lnot (\lnot P\lor \lnot Q)}{13,14,\negI}

\ai{\mask{Γ}}{\lnot P\mc{\lor }\lnot Q}{15,\negE}

\end{argumentN}

\item Add missing items.

\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{\mc{\lnot }(P\limplies Q)}{premise}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P}{\mc{\lnot }P}{A}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }P, \mc{\lnot }Q}}{\mask{\mc{\lnot }P}}{2}

\ai{\mask{P}}{\mask{P}}{A}

\ai{\mask{P, \mc{\lnot }Q}}{\mask{P}}{4}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P, P}{\mc{\lnot }\lnot Q}{3,5,\negI}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P, P}{Q}{6,\negE}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }P}}{\mask{P\mc{\limplies }Q}}{\mask{7,\condI}}

\ai{Γ, \mask{\mc{\lnot }P}}{\mc{\lnot }(P\limplies Q)}{1}

\ai{Γ}{\mc{\lnot }\lnot P}{8,9,\negI}

\ai{Γ}{P}{\mask{10,\negE}}

\end{argumentN}



\item Add missing datums. 

\begin{argumentN}[1]

%generated by gentzen
 \ai{\Gamma}{P\mc{\lor }Q}{premise}

 \ai{\Delta}{\lnot Q\mc{\lor }R}{premise}

 \ai{\mask{P}}{P}{A}

 \ai{\mask{Q}}{Q}{A}

 \ai{\mask{R}}{R}{A}

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }Q}}{\mc{\lnot }Q}{A}

 \ai{\mask{Q, \mc{\lnot }P}}{Q}{4}

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }Q, \mc{\lnot }P}}{\mc{\lnot }Q}{6}

 \ai{\mask{Q, \mc{\lnot }Q}}{\mc{\lnot }\lnot P}{7,8,\negI}

 \ai{\mask{Q, \mc{\lnot }Q}}{P}{9,\negE}

 \ai{\mask{Q, \mc{\lnot }Q}}{P\mc{\lor }R}{10,\disjI}

 \ai{\mask{R}}{P\mc{\lor }R}{5,\disjI}

 \ai{\mask{\Delta, Q}}{P\mc{\lor }R}{2,11,12,\disjE}

 \ai{\mask{P}}{P\mc{\lor }R}{3,\disjI}

\ai{\Gamma, \Delta}{P\mc{\lor }R}{1,13,14,\disjE}

\end{argumentN}




\newpage

\item Add missing items.

\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{P\mc{\limplies }Q}{premise}

\ai{Δ}{R\mc{\lor }\lnot Q}{premise}

\ai{\mask{R}}{\mask{R}}{A}

\ai{R, P}{R}{3}

\ai{R}{\mask{P\mc{\limplies }R}}{4,\condI}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }Q}}{\mask{\mc{\lnot }Q}}{A}

\ai{\mask{P}}{\mask{P}}{\mask{A}}

\ai{Γ, P}{Q}{1,7,\condE}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }Q}, P}{\mc{\lnot }Q}{6}

\ai{Γ, \mc{\lnot }Q}{\mc{\lnot }P}{8,9,\negI}

\ai{Γ, \mc{\lnot }Q}{\lnot P\mc{\lor }R}{10,\disjI}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }P}}{\mask{\mc{\lnot }P}}{\mask{A}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P, \mask{\mc{\lnot }R}}{\mask{\mc{\lnot }P}}{12}

\ai{P, \mask{\mc{\lnot }R}}{P}{7}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P, P}{\mask{\mc{\lnot }\lnot R}}{13,14,\negI}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot }P, P}}{\mask{R}}{15,\negE}

\ai{\mc{\lnot }P}{P\mc{\limplies }R}{16,\condI}

\ai{Γ, \mc{\lnot }Q}{P\mc{\limplies }R}{\mask{11,17,5,\disjE}}

\ai{Γ, Δ}{P\mc{\limplies }R}{\mask{2,5,18,\disjE}}

\end{argumentN}

\item Continue the following derivation until you reach \lbh{-s /G:CPQ}.

\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{\mc{\lnot }P}{premise}

\ai{P}{P}{A}

\ai{P, \mc{\lnot }Q}{P}{2}

\ai{Γ, \mc{\lnot }Q}{\mc{\lnot }P}{1}
\answer{
\ai{Γ, P}{\mc{\lnot }\lnot Q}{3,4,\negI}

\ai{Γ, P}{Q}{5,\negE}

\ai{Γ}{P\mc{\limplies }Q}{6,\condI}
}
\end{argumentN}

\item Derive from \lbh{-s /G:CPQ} and \lbh{-s /D:APQ} to
 \lbh{-s /G,/D:Q}

\answer{

\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{P\mc{\limplies }Q}{premise}

\ai{Δ}{P\mc{\lor }Q}{premise}

\ai{P}{P}{A}

\ai{Γ, P}{Q}{1,3,\condE}

\ai{Q}{Q}{A}

\ai{Δ, Γ}{Q}{2,4,5,\disjE}

\end{argumentN}
}
\item Construct derivation from \lbh{-s /G:CPQ} and \lbh{-s /G:CQR} to
 \lbh{-s /G,/D:CPQ}.

\answer{
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{P\mc{\limplies }R}{premise}

\ai{Δ}{R\mc{\limplies }Q}{premise}

\ai{P}{P}{A}

\ai{Γ, P}{R}{1,3,\condE}

\ai{Γ, Δ, P}{Q}{2,4,\condE}

\ai{Γ, Δ}{P\mc{\limplies }Q}{5,\condI}

\end{argumentN}
}

\item Derive from \lbh{-s /G:APQ} and \lbh{-s /D:CPR} to
 \lbh{-s /G,/D:ARQ}.

\answer{
 \begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{P\mc{\lor }Q}{premise}

\ai{Δ}{P\mc{\limplies }R}{premise}

\ai{P}{P}{A}

\ai{Δ, P}{R}{2,3,\condE}

\ai{Δ, P}{R\mc{\lor }Q}{4,\disjI}

\ai{Q}{Q}{A}

\ai{Q}{R\mc{\lor }Q}{6,\disjI}

\ai{Γ, Δ}{R\mc{\lor }Q}{1,5,7,\disjE}

\end{argumentN}
}


\item Derive from \lbh{-s /G:APQ} and \lbh{-s /D:CQR} to \lbh{-s 
 /G,/D:APR}

\answer{
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{P\mc{\lor }Q}{premise}

\ai{Δ}{Q\mc{\limplies }R}{premise}

\ai{P}{P}{A}

\ai{P}{P\mc{\lor }R}{3,\disjI}

\ai{Q}{Q}{A}

\ai{Δ, Q}{R}{2,5,\condE}

\ai{Δ, Q}{P\mc{\lor }R}{6,\disjI}

\ai{Γ, Δ}{P\mc{\lor }R}{1,4,7,\disjE}

\end{argumentN}
}
\item Derive from \lbh{-s /G:NCPQ} to \lbh{-s /G:NQ}

\answer{
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{\mc{\lnot }(P\limplies Q)}{premise}

\ai{Q}{Q}{A}

\ai{Q, P}{Q}{2}

\ai{Q}{P\mc{\limplies }Q}{3,\condI}

\ai{Γ, Q}{\mc{\lnot }(P\limplies Q)}{1}

\ai{Γ}{\mc{\lnot }Q}{4,5,\negI}

\end{argumentN}
}

\item Derive from \lbh{-s /G:CRP}, \lbh{-s /D:CNRS} and \lbh{-s /T:NP} to 
 \lbh{-s /G,/D,/T:KSNR}.
\answer{
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{R\mc{\limplies }P}{premise}

\ai{Δ}{\lnot R\mc{\limplies }S}{premise}

\ai{Θ}{\mc{\lnot }P}{premise}

\ai{R}{R}{premise}

\ai{Γ, R}{P}{1,4,\condE}

\ai{Θ, R}{\mc{\lnot }P}{3}

\ai{Γ, Θ}{\mc{\lnot }R}{5,6,\negI}

\ai{Γ, Δ, Θ}{S}{2,7,\condE}

\ai{Γ, Δ, Θ}{S\mc{\land }\lnot R}{7,8,\conjI}

\end{argumentN}
}


\item Derive from \lbh{-s /G:AAPQR} to \lbh{-s /G:APAQR}.

 \answer{
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{P\mc{\lor }(Q\lor R)}{premise}

\ai{P}{P}{A}

\ai{P}{P\mc{\lor }Q}{2,\disjI}

\ai{P}{(P\lor Q)\mc{\lor }R}{3,\disjI}

\ai{Q\mc{\lor }R}{Q\mc{\lor }R}{A}

\ai{Q}{Q}{A}

\ai{Q}{P\mc{\lor }Q}{6,\disjI}

\ai{Q}{(P\lor Q)\mc{\lor }R}{7,\disjI}

\ai{R}{R}{A}

\ai{R}{(P\lor Q)\mc{\lor }R}{9,\disjI}

\ai{Q\mc{\lor }R}{(P\lor Q)\mc{\lor }R}{5,8,10,\disjE}

\ai{Γ}{(P\lor Q)\mc{\lor }R}{1,4,11,\disjE}

\end{argumentN}
}

\end{enumerate}
